title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. 

(a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 
(Amendment) and Variation of Days and Hours (Ardee and 
Drogheda) Order 2020. 

(b) This Order shall come into operation on 1st January 2021.
text_norm: 1 (a) order may cited district court district area (amendment) variation day hour (ardee drogheda) order 2020 (b) order shall come operation 1st january 2021

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5
text_raw:
2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5 

of 1961), is hereby amended by – 

(a) 

the substitution at reference number 164 for the matter in 
column (4) of the following: 

“Ardee - Second Friday in each month at 10.00 a.m.”, and 

(b) 

the substitution at reference number 166 for the matter in 
column (4) of the following: 

“Drogheda” - First, second, third and fourth Monday in each 
month. First, third and fourth Tuesday in each month. Second 
Thursday in each month. All sittings at 10.00 a.m.”, and
text_norm: 2 first schedule district court (areas) order 1961 (s.i no 5 1961) hereby amended - (a) substitution reference number 164 matter column (4) following ardee - second friday month 10.00 a.m (b) substitution reference number 166 matter column (4) following drogheda - first second third fourth monday month first third fourth tuesday month second thursday month sitting 10.00 a.m

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I.
text_raw:
3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. 

No. 5 of 1961), is hereby amended by – 

(a) 

the substitution at reference number 143 for the matter in 
column (4) of the following: 

“Ardee - Second Friday in each month at 10.00 a.m.”, and 

(c) 

the substitution at reference number 145 for the matter in 
column (4) of the following: 

 “Drogheda” - First, second, third and fourth Monday in each 
month. First, third and fourth Tuesday in each month. Second 
Thursday in each month. All sittings at 10.00 a.m.”, and 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated. 

[643] 3 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service 
 14 December 2020 

MARY IRVINE, 
 Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to sign 

documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

LINDA MEMERY, 
 Officer of the Courts Service designated for the purpose of 

authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to section 
10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [643]

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order provides for the variation of Days and Hours at Ardee and Drogheda
